description: This file defines a React functional component called TenantSwitcher that manages tenant selection and user interactions related to tenants and authentication.

methods.name: TenantSwitcher
methods.description: React functional component that fetches available tenants, displays a tenant selection dropdown, and provides user options like logout.

methods.name: fetchTenants
methods.description: Asynchronous function that retrieves tenant data from the API and updates the store.

methods.name: handleTenantChange
methods.description: Event handler for changing the selected tenant, updates application's tenant context, and reloads the page.
